data.title: Best Art Museums In Spain
data.meta_description: Picasso, Goya, El Greco, Velazquez, Dalí – these are just some of the iconic Spanish artists that defined their respective artistic movements. Spain is endowed with a wealth of museums and galleries holding spectacular artistic treasures. Visitors to Spain will be treated to several centuries of art, some of it the most important in the world, from early renaissance pieces to 20th century surrealism. Here are the best art museums in Spain.
